CustomField.formula: IF( Legacy_CPO__c =false, IF(ISPICKVAL(Apttus_Config2__Status__c,'Ready for Execution') ,IF(OR(ISPICKVAL(ERP__c,'P20'),ISPICKVAL(ERP__c,'Blue Planet')) ,HYPERLINK('/apex/Apttus_XApps__EditInExcelLaunch?selectedRecordId='+Id+'&appName=Alliance Export&mode=touchless&outputType=None', IMAGE("/resource/Alliance_Export","Alliance Export"),"_self"),null),null),null)
CustomField.label: Alliance Export
